characters.name: Blackbeak
characters.description: The leader of the Royal Griffon Defense Force in My Little Pony: Legends of Magic Issue #4.

characters.name: Elke
characters.description: A former Griffonstone Boffyball player mentioned in Friends Forever Issue #24.

characters.name: Firegem
characters.description: One of the Griffonstone Boffyball players, later the Griffonstone team mascot, in Friends Forever Issue #24.

characters.name: Franz
characters.description: A Griffonstone Boffyball player mentioned in Friends Forever Issue #24. Twisted his wing.

characters.name: Gabby
characters.description: Gabby, short for Gabriella, is a female griffon, supporting character, and member of the Cutie Mark Crusaders who first appears in the season six episode The Fault in Our Cutie Marks.

characters.name: Galena
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. Also appears in Princess Spike, The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, and The Ending of the End - Part 2. First featured in production artwork at Ponycon 2015.

characters.name: Gallus
characters.description: Gallus is a male griffon and one of the Young Six[2][3][4] who first appears in season eight of the show as a student at Twilight Sparkle's School of Friendship. In the series finale The Last Problem, he is captain of the Canterlot royal guard years in the future.

characters.name: Garner
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone and The Fault in Our Cutie Marks. Also appears in The Ending of the End - Part 2 and The Last Problem. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #22 U.

characters.name: Gaston
characters.description: A male griffon that appears in Rainbow Falls, Equestria Games, The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone, and The Fault in Our Cutie Marks. He shares his design with "Gordon".

characters.name: Gavin
characters.description: A young griffon resident of Griffonstone in Gallus' story in The Hearth's Warming Club. He shares his design with S09E26 Unnamed Male Griffon #2. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #7 C. Unrelated to Gilda, Grampa Gruff, and Gabby.

characters.name: Gerard
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone, The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, and The Ending of the End - Part 2. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #8 C.

characters.name: Gertie
characters.description: A Griffonstone Boffyball player mentioned in Friends Forever Issue #24. Suffers from a case of musk ox pox.

characters.name: Lord Gestal
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61 as head of the council of griffon lords of Griffonstone at the Convocation of Creatures. He is a character in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during the "Convocation of the Creatures!" eent. His in-game description states, "Highly respected among the griffon nobility, Lord Gestal is an experienced politician who seeks peace and prosperity above all else."

characters.name: Gigi
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. Also appears in The Fault in Our Cutie Marks and The Ending of the End - Part 2.

characters.name: Gilda
characters.description: Gilda is a female griffon and supporting character in the series. She first appears as an antagonist in Griffon the Brush Off, and she makes subsequent appearances in later episodes, chapter books, and the IDW comics. She is called Gilda the Griffon in some merchandise.

characters.name:
Griffon Shopkeeper
Gimme Moore
characters.description: A griffon resident and shopkeeper of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball. She is a character called "Griffon Shopkeeper" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of her states, "This griffon storeowner will sell you her wares (discounted and lightly used items upstairs)."

characters.name: Giselle
characters.description: Giselle is a female background griffon in Rainbow Falls, Equestria Games, and The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. She is unnamed in the series, but she is named in merchandise.

characters.name: Glenda
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61 and Issue #62 as the official griffon archivist at the Convocation of Creatures. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Convocation of the Creatures!" event. Her bio states, "Griffonstone's foremost archivist -- more or less by default, as she was the only one interested in the job. She's really good at it, though!"

characters.name: Lord Goldstone
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #62 as one of the griffon lords of Griffonstone at the Convocation of Creatures and the main antagonist of the arc. He is a character in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss for the "Convocation of the Creatures!" event. His in-game description states, "One of the more conniving griffon lords, Goldstone will entertain the most devious of plans if it will help him expand his own holdings."

characters.name:
Prideful Griffon Racer
Gordon
characters.description: A male griffon who appears in Equestria Games. He shares his design with "Gaston". He is a character called "Prideful Griffon Racer" in Gameloft's mobile game. His in-game description states, "Being an Equestria Games competitor is certainly something to be proud of -- but this griffon kept his beak in the air for practically the whole event. Simmer down, buddy."

characters.name: Gracie
characters.description: A young griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone.

characters.name:
Li'l Griffon
Graff
characters.description: A young griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. He is a character called "Li'l Griffon" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "Not every griffon makes friends easily -- but this little griffon's as cute as can be!"

characters.name: Grampa Gruff
characters.description: Grampa Gruff, or Grandpa Gruff, is a male griffon and supporting character who first appears in the season five episode The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. It is stated in The Hearth's Warming Club that he is "Grampa" in name only and does not have any familial grandchildren, contradictory to The Elements of Harmony Vol. II guidebook's identification of Gilda as his granddaughter; Jim Miller has stated that Gilda, Gavin, Gruff, and Gabby are unrelated[2] and that Gruff is Gallus' guardian but not grandfather.[3]

characters.name: Gregor
characters.description: Leader of a griffon colony and rival of Commander Hurricane. He challenges Hurricane to a race, but he gives up when Princesses Celestia and Luna give him some eclairs. He has a sweet tooth.

characters.name: Greta
characters.description: Greta is a female griffon and supporting character who first appears in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. She is Gilda's first griffon friend.

characters.name: Gretchen
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone, The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, and The Ending of the End - Part 2; one of the Griffonstone Boffyball players in Friends Forever Issue #24. Identified on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #25 C. Retroactively one of three Friends Forever Issue 24-redesigned griffons, the other two being Greta and Grampa Gruff.

characters.name: Griselda
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. Also appears in The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #26 R. Not to be confused with Gilda/Grizelda. She is a character named "Rockin' Griffon Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game bio states "The School of Friendship's future studnt body consists of creatures of all kinds--and that includes griffons with SERIOUS 'tude."

characters.name: King Grover
characters.description: The first king of Griffonstone who united the griffons with his discovery of the Idol of Boreas. First mentioned in the chapter book Princess Celestia and the Summer of Royal Waves. Also mentioned in Friends Forever Issue #24 and A Matter of Principals.

characters.name: Gunter
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. Also appears in The Fault in Our Cutie Marks and The Ending of the End - Part 2.

characters.name: Gustave le Grand
characters.description: Gustave le Grand[note 1] is a male griffon baker who appears in the episodes MMMystery on the Friendship Express, Equestria Games, and Princess Spike. He is the second griffon to appear in the series, after Gilda.

characters.name: King Guto
characters.description: The fourteenth and last king of Griffonstone whose defeat at the hands of Arimaspi led to the kingdom's decline.

characters.name: Hilda
characters.description: A Griffonstone Boffyball player mentioned in Friends Forever Issue #24. Suffers from a case of musk ox pox.

characters.name: Coach Klaus
characters.description: The Griffonstone Boffyball team coach in Friends Forever Issue #24.

characters.name:
Sporty Griffon Racer
Natalya
characters.description: One of two female griffons that appears in Rainbow Falls and Equestria Games. Also appears in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone, The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, Uncommon Bond, and The Ending of the End - Part 2. She shares her design with S04E24 Unnamed Female Griffon #2 and S09E26 Unnamed Female Griffon #1. She is a character called "Sporty Griffon Racer" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during the "Convocation of the Creatures!" event. Her in-game description states, "This griffon showed up to the Equestria Games and came away with a third-place finish -- but hey, she did it with class!"

characters.name: Rinehart
characters.description: One of the Griffonstone Boffyball players in Friends Forever Issue #24.

characters.name: Vermouth Roux
characters.description: One of the judges of the cooking competition in Friends Forever Issue #1.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Female Griffon #1
characters.description: A female griffon who appears in Equestria Games. She shares her design with Giselle and S04E24 Unnamed Female Griffon #3.

characters.name:
Rookie Griffon Racer
S04E24 Unnamed Female Griffon #2
characters.description: A female griffon who appears in Equestria Games. She shares her design with "Natalya" and S09E26 Unnamed Female Griffon #1, and is a character called "Rookie Griffon Racer" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "This rising star of the griffon racing team had a good showing at the recent Equestria Games. Do we smell a biopic in the making...?"

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Female Griffon #3
characters.description: A female griffon who appears in Equestria Games. She shares her design with Giselle and S04E24 Unnamed Female Griffon #1.

characters.name: S05E08 Unnamed Female Griffon #1
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone. Also appears in The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem.

characters.name: S05E08 Unnamed Female Griffon #8
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone, The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, and The Ending of the End - Part 2.

characters.name: S05E08 Unnamed Female Griffon #9
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone.

characters.name: S05E08 Unnamed Male Griffon #2
characters.description: An elderly griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone and The Fault in Our Cutie Marks.

characters.name: S05E08 Unnamed Male Griffon #4
characters.description: A griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone, The Fault in Our Cutie Marks, and The Ending of the End - Part 2.

characters.name: S06E19 Unnamed Female Griffon #1
characters.description: An elderly griffon resident of Griffonstone in The Fault in Our Cutie Marks.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Female Griffon #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Canterlot. Shares her design with "Natalya" and S04E24 Unnamed Female Griffon #2.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Male Griffon #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Canterlot.

characters.name:
Tiny Griffon Friendship Student
S09E26 Unnamed Male Griffon #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a future student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design with Gavin. He is a character named "Tiny Griffon Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game, and he serves as a boss battle helper during the "Prank to the Future Part Two" event. His in-game bio states "The School of Friendship's future student body counts creatures of all kinds--including some of the littlest griffons around."

characters.name: Ambassador
characters.description: Mentioned on Friends Forever Issue #28 page 2.
